Package alma.scheduling.planning_mode_sim.simulator

Class Summary
ArchiveSimulator The ArchiveSimulator stores the relevant entities needed for the simulation.
CalibrationSimulator Description
ClockSimulator The ClockSimulator class implements a clock that is used in all simulation modes.
Container Description
ControlSimulator Description
DiurnalModel DiurnalModel is a class that allows one to craft a function that computes values of physical quantities based on a 24-hour clock.
ExecutiveSimulator Description
Mode Description
PipelineSimulator This class is only a skeleton at present.
SimulationInput The SimulationData class is an extension of the Properties class.
Simulator The Simulator class gathers and verifies all input data to the simulation and controls the running of the simulation.
Tag The Tag class is a collection of static strings that are the names of various properties and events that are used throughout the simulation.
WeatherModel Description
